EmailTemplate.subject: Get Hypnotised by Paul Van Dyk
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
Paul Van Dyk Brings the Light to Trance Nation
April 14, 2017@10pm
Over the last 20 years, the term ‘electronic dance music’ and the name ‘Paul van Dyk’ have become all but one. Now, this pioneering Berliner and two time No. 1 DJ is ready to light the stage up with a kinetic performance in Play Club, Malaysia.
Join us for a hypnotising sound experience complete with technicoloured laser imagery all night long. Head to the Martell bar to get your complimentary NCF drink and party kit to start the evening light.
<[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/MY_MRT_1704_VanDykTranceNation_form_page.html?FirstName={{lead.First Name}}&LastName={{lead.Last Name}}&Email={{lead.Email Address}}]]>
Invade the night with Martell NCF
If you can’t join us on April 14th for Trance Nation with Paul Van Dyk, find the next Martell NCF Invasion Parties near to you. We’ll be bringing our army of femme fatale DJs and electro bands.
Try our Martell Copper Mapping Camera to get a unique bottle of Martell NCF stamped with your party selfies.
Follow our Party Tail <[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/]]>
